info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 10:36PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Elkhart, northwestern Noble and southwestern Lagrange Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1035 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Middlebury, or 8 miles northeast of Goshen, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Millersburg, Ligonier and Topeka. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 108 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
